title: Historic Building with Rooftop Views of the North Bay
posting_body: Monthly parking available at Masonic Garage
Newly remodeled, Nob Hill one bedroom unit in historical building.
This beautifully updated apartment home features new hardwood floors, fixtures, and stainless steel appliances.
Bathroom fixtures, etc. are new, with vintage tiling.
Located at Sacramento & Taylor St, across from Huntington Park, Grace Cathedral, The Fairmont Hotel, and SF Masonic Auditorium.
At the cross-section of many vibrant neighborhoods, shopping, dining, and nightlife are all a short walk away.
Pet policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a pet rent of $50 per pet.
Pet deposit is $500 for 1 pet and $750 for 2 pets.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Contact us today for the most up to date information!
